hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:that she intended to buy Barira (a slave girl) and her masters stipulated that they would have her Wala'. When `Aisha mentioned that to the Prophet (ﷺ) ; he said, "Buy her, for the Wala' is for the one who manumits

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا أَعْتَقَ فِي الْكَفَّارَةِ لِمَنْ يَكُونُ وَلاَؤُهُ
chapter.eng-name: If somebody manumits a slave for expiation, for whom will the slave’s Wala be?
